quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Greys Anatomy and Beverly Hills
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, drama, line. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In Beverly Hills, 90210, what was the name of the television show that Steves mom Samantha Sanders starred in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Hartley House

questions.question: Which Greys Anatomy character said this: If I miss a real procedure because of this case, theyre gonna call me 007 because I killed you.?
The following words belong to which Greys Anatomy character: My mommys a filthy whore.?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mother/Daughter Fashion Show

questions.question: On Beverly Hills, 90210, what does David Silvers dad Mel, do for a living?
Which character from Greys Anatomy said this: Look, Im gonna go upstairs and take a shower, OK? And when I get back down here, you wont be here.?
Which of the interns on the show Greys Anatomy made the following statement: Men dont buy tampons!?
Who was Dr. Bailey from Greys Anatomy talking to when she said this:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Derek and Meredith

questions.question: Which surgical attending from the medical drama Greys Anatomy delivered these words: The only person that can keep a promise so big is God, and I havent seen him pick up a scalpel lately.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dr. Burke

questions.question: Who are these characters from the show Greys Anatomy talking about?:

options.text: . Cristina Yang: [they all see the Nazi] Thats the Nazi?
. George OMalley: I thought the Nazi would be a man.
. Meredith Grey: I thought the Nazi would be... the Nazi.
. Isobel Izzie Stevens: [Izzie walks up behind them] Maybe its professional jealousy. Maybe shes brilliant and they call her a Nazi because theyre jealous. Maybe shes nice.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dr. Bailey

questions.question: Who was Brandon with the night Kelly got burned in the fire on the popular TV show Beverly Hills, 90210?
Which of these characters from Greys Anatomy made this statement about surgery: Its like candy, but with blood. Which is so much better!?

Who delivered this line on the show Greys Anatomy: I love you, in a really, really big pretend to like your taste in music, let you eat the last piece of cheesecake, hold a radio over my head outside your window, unfortunate way that makes me hate you, love you. So pick me, choose me, love me.?
Which intern from the Greys Anatomy TV series said this: Go for it, man. Get yours, Im down with the rainbow. Oh, are you not gay??

questions.question: What happened to Emma Peel, after she quit as an Avenger Girl on The Avengers?

options.text: She was killed in action by an enemy agent.
